lead_paragraph: Many Poles are questioning whether the European identity and freedom that meant so much after the fall of Communism hold the same value today.

headline.print_headline: As Political Crosscurrents Buffet Europe, Poland Assesses Its Values
headline.main: 'We Don’t Need to Be Alone’: A Political Shift Has Poland Assessing Its Values

snippet: Many Poles are questioning whether the European identity and freedom that meant so much after the fall of Communism hold the same value today....
abstract: Memo from Poland; ongoing debate over Polish identity at time when country's politics have taken rightward and nationalistic turn under leadership of Law and Justice party and its head Jaroslaw Kaczynski has special resonance in city of Wroclaw, which benefits greatly from foreign and domestic tourism; at issue in debate is whether young people, who do not remember past Soviet bloc oppression, agree with those who believe liberty and European identity are beneficial.
